posts.title: Hello My Friend
posts.text: Welcome to 蝎子莱莱的小窝!You can follow me if you like.If you get any problems with my home page setting, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. My Real Name蝎子莱莱 is just my nickname~1My name is 张驰,you can call me "阿张". Sounds good,right? My date of birth12002-08-12,and my lunar date is"七月初四" Now.I’m 20 years old.I’v grown up~ My current situation1I am a college student,studying in Shangdong University now. I’m a SDUer,that’s goooood~ My hobby1football,movies,video games and so on. Who is not yet a playful person?
